A teacher comes across a secret list of anti-Ching rebel names and quickly becomes a target for Ching loyalists. Lo Meng teams up with kung fu Wang Yu to add some truly pioneering lion dancing action footage.
 The amazing lion dance sequences alone give this film major historical significance where it's the first time Northern and Southern lion dancing skills are compared.
